scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.p1: This Acceptable Use Policy complements the Terms of Use and sets rules for responsible use of the Service and its resources, including APIs, apps, and integrations.

responsibleUse.title: 2. Responsible Use
responsibleUse.p1: Use the Service ethically, respecting applicable laws, third-party rights, and other users’ experience. Safeguard your credentials and devices.

prohibited.title: 3. Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.li1: Abusing the Service via aggressive automation, spam, or attempts to overload (DoS/DDoS);
prohibited.li2: Exploiting vulnerabilities, bypassing authentication, or disabling security mechanisms;
prohibited.li3: Publishing illegal, defamatory, discriminatory, sexually explicit content, or content inciting violence/hatred;
prohibited.li4: Infringing intellectual property, privacy, or third-party data;

security.title: 4. Security

reporting.title: 9. Reporting
reporting.p1: To report abuse, security issues, or violations, contact the indicated support channel. Include evidence, dates, URLs, and, if possible, request IDs.
